title: Bug 138384java.lang.ClassFormatError: Invalid method Code length83071 in class file org/eclipse/jdt/internal/compiler/impl/Constant
description: Bug 138384java.lang.ClassFormatError: Invalid method Code length83071 in class file org/eclipse/jdt/internal/compiler/impl/Constant The problem has been reported before but for a different reason: bug 113796.
OB: The weaver generates invalid bytecode when weaving a large method.
EB: Instead it should issue an error (or even split the method).
